text: Yang Zhenduo (1926 – 7 November 2020) was a Chinese martial artist and educator. He was born in Beijing. He was known for his Tai chi movements. He was Chairman of the International Yang Style Tai Chi Chuan Association. Yang died on 7 November 2020 in Beijing at the age of 94.楊露禪曾孫、楊氏太極拳第四代嫡傳人楊振鐸逝世 ==References== ==Other websites== * International Yang Family Tai Chi Chuan Association Category:Chinese educators Category:People from Beijing Category:1926 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Chinese martial artists
title: Yang Zhenduo
